Name: YoloMic
About the game: Use YoloMic to be visually alerted of external sounds such as door knocks. Never miss another pizza delivery while blasting your headphones again! Ideal for headphone users. Requires a microphone. Features Audio triggered visual alerts Alerts shown as audio frequency spectrum to help identify sound Noise isolation to reduce background noise Multiple alert positions Themeable and resizable alerts Adjustable audio sensitivity Audio source selection Alert toggle and other hotkeys Near zero impact on performance
Meta Title: YoloMic: Mar 30, 2020, Dragonrise Games and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on YoloMic? Check out the release date (Mar 30, 2020), developer insights from Dragonrise Games, and a complete game summary.
